mapper.select: SELECT J.PRICE, J.ACCOUNT_CODE, J.DEBIT_CREDIT FROM SLIP S RIGHT JOIN JOURNALIZE J ON(S.SLIP_CODE = J.SLIP_CODE) WHERE TO_CHAR(S.SLIP_DATE, 'YYYY') = #{year} - 1 AND COM_CODE = #{comCode}
SELECT J.PRICE, J.ACCOUNT_CODE, J.DEBIT_CREDIT FROM SLIP S RIGHT JOIN JOURNALIZE J ON(S.SLIP_CODE = J.SLIP_CODE) WHERE TO_CHAR(S.SLIP_DATE, 'YYYY') <= #{year} - 1 AND COM_CODE = #{comCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MFRG_STMT(MFRG_STMT_CODE, COM_CODE, YEAR, TERM, CLOSING, VAL13, SUM90) VALUES(SEQ_MFRG_STMT_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{comCode}, #{year}, #{term}, #{closing}, #{val13}, #{sum90})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, MFRG_STMT_CODE, VAL13, CLOSING FROM (SELECT MFRG_STMT_CODE, VAL13, CLOSING FROM MFRG_STMT WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND YEAR = #{year} ORDER BY MFRG_STMT_CODE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT SUM90 FROM MFRG_STMT WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND YEAR = #{year} AND MFRG_STMT_CODE = (SELECT MAX(MFRG_STMT_CODE) FROM MFRG_STMT WHERE CLOSING = 'Y' AND YEAR = #{year})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INCOME_STMT(INCOME_STMT_CODE, COM_CODE, YEAR, TERM, CLOSING, SUM10, V40100, VAL213, SUM30, SUM40, SUM50, SUM100) VALUES(SEQ_INCOME_STMT_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{comCode}, #{year}, #{term}, #{closing}, #{sum10}, #{v40100}, #{val213}, #{sum30}, #{sum40}, #{sum50}, #{sum100})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, INCOME_STMT_CODE, VAL213, CLOSING FROM (SELECT INCOME_STMT_CODE, VAL213, CLOSING FROM INCOME_STMT WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND YEAR = #{year} ORDER BY INCOME_STMT_CODE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
